text: Tatlı İntikam is a Turkish television series produced by D Productions. The series is broadcasting on Kanal D. It is written by Pınar Ordu and İlker Aslan kaleme. ==Cast== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="FFAA44" ! Role !! Actor |- | Pelin || Leyla Lydia Tuğutlu |- | Tankut Sinan || Furkan Andıç |- | Tolga || Can Nergis |- | Süheyla || Zeyno Günenç |- | Basak || Hazal Türesan |- | Meliha || Ayşenil Şamlıoğlu |- | Serkan || Barış Gönenen |- | Rıza || Kerem Atabeyoğlu |- | Bülent || Çağrı Çitanak |- | Ceyda || Seren Deniz Yalçın |- | Necip || Bülent Seyran |- | Havva Tankut || Elif Çakman |- | Hakan || Emre Taşkıran |- | Simay || Cemre Gümeli. |- |Rüzgar|| Büşra Develi |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 Turkish television series debuts Category:Turkish romantic comedy television series Category:Television series by D Productions Category:Kanal D original programming Category:Turkish-language television shows
title: Tatlı İntikam
